p: The polymer sample of poly(vinylidene fluoride) and silicon dioxide was used for the fabrication of porous membranes by a simple phase inversion process. The various ratios viz, 50:50, 70:30, 80:20, and 90:10 of PVdF and SiO 2 have been taken to prepare the membranes. The physical status and nature of the prepared films were given in the Supplementary Table S1. It is understood that the flexible nature has been obtained for the low SiO 2 contents. Beyond 20 wt.% of SiO 2, the films are turned to be brittle.
